page.title: 18Entertainment
page.content: Most people in the area belong to one club or another.The{British Legion}has a strong following and organises dances,excursions and galas.There is a {Country Club}in Milborne Port at which there are functions on most nights. There are six public houses and three restaurants which are all well patronised. The {Village hall}holds many different entertainments as do the local churches. There is very little for young people to do in the area so they have to go to Yeovil for most of their entertainment which is very costly. There is one night club {Tapps Hotel} which holds regular discos and live entertainment. The local hunt is also very active. The general rule is,if one wants entertainment one makes it.
